Trade/Device Name(s): Contour® NEXT LINK Wireless Blood Glucose Meter
Contour® NEXT LINK Wireless Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Contour® NEXT LINK Wireless Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Contour NEXT LINK Wireless Blood Glucose Monitoring System enabling home glucose measurement and wireless data transfer to compatible insulin pumps/software
Indications for Use Summary: Over-the-counter single-patient device for measuring glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip and palm, enabling wireless transmission to compatible Medtronic MiniMed insulin pumps and data management software; not for diagnostic/screening use or for neonates
